::Savanna::

She could see the hurt in Kluster's eyes as he said the condition of 
his belovedship.  She too, had a vague impression that she had felt 
upset when her ship was totally distroyed.

She looked at Kluster,"I'm sure the ship is repairable.  All you need 
is the parts."  She looked at Phobia, "I wonder if you might know 
where we could get some?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster looks over at Phobia, his eyes a bit sad. "Unfortunately, 
the 
> predacon intelligence got word of us launching off. They attacked 
and 
> boarded. My tactical and science officers all died in the battle. 
As for the 
> other leaders, they're currently at the Ark, fighting. I had to 
stay to 
> welcome you here."
> 
> He looks around the conference room, "Would you like quarters 
untill the 
> battle is over?"
> 
> (All the quarters in The Cybertronian Fire have the potential to be 
fully 
> monitored, so it wouldn't really matter if they trusted him or not.)
